name: Query Report
query:
SELECT
    p.payment_id AS "Payment ID:Link/Payment:120",
    p.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    p.booking AS "Booking:Link/Booking:150",
    p.amount AS "Package Amount:Currency:120",
    p.visa_amount AS "Visa Amount:Currency:120",
    p.total_amount AS "Total Amount:Currency:120",
    p.advance_amount AS "Advance Amount:Currency:120",
    p.balance_amount AS "Balance Amount:Currency:120",
    p.payment_status AS "Payment Status:Data:120",
    p.payment_count AS "Payment Count:Int:100",
    p.modified AS "Last Updated:Datetime:150"
FROM
    `tabPayment` p
ORDER BY
    p.modified DESC;
